sentences.en: AI better considers war consequences of accepting a vassal.
sentences.cn: AI会更好的考虑接受附庸国可能引起的战争.

sentences.en: Ceremonial acknowledgment by a vassal of allegiance to his lord under feudal law.
sentences.cn: 自己所效忠的君主;忠诚的臣子.

sentences.en: Explain what a suzerain - vassal treaty was in the ancient Near East.
sentences.cn: 解释什么是在古老近东的宗主附庸条约.
修改了附庸国提供的快乐.

sentences.en: He, in turn, was vassal to the Great Khan of China.
sentences.cn: 而这个满族头人又藩属于中国大可汗.

sentences.en: I, your vassal, have employed and troubled your unknown sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 我是您的臣子,以前不知道您就是公爵殿下,竟那样叫您受累, 麻烦了您.

sentences.en: Opponents of the treaty argue that monetary union will turn France into a vassal of Germany.
sentences.cn: 协定的反对者认为货币联盟会使法国沦为德国的附庸国。

sentences.en: So the forepart Non - invasive Measurement of Vassal wall become more important.
sentences.cn: 因此,对人体血管壁病变的早期无创检测有着十分重要的临床价值.

sentences.en: The fidelity owed by a vassal to his feudal lord.
sentences.cn: 效忠诸侯对封建领主的忠诚.

sentences.en: The lord in return owed his vassal protection and an assured livelihood.
sentences.cn: 主返回欠他的附庸保护和有保证的生计.

sentences.en: The vassal swore that he would be loyal to the king forever.
sentences.cn: 这位封臣宣誓他将永远忠诚于国王.

sentences.en: Vassal AI never refuse to talk to their master.
sentences.cn: 附庸国不会拒绝与宗主国见面.

sentences.en: Wales was a vassal kingdom at that time.
sentences.cn: 那时威尔士是个附庸国.

sentences.en: You can now airlift into cities of your vassal.
sentences.cn: 可以空运部队到附庸国城市.

sentences.en: You don't pay supply costs for units inside your vassal's borders.
sentences.cn: 部队在附庸国境内时不需要额外的补给费.

trans.tran_cn: 奴仆，<史>（封建时代）诸侯，从属者，下属
trans.tran_en: In feudal society, a vassal was a man who gave military service to a lord, in return for which he was protected by the lord and received land to live on
